channel.title: Food Timers?and Random Events?
channel.description: Anyone describe to me how to put in food timers and a good time for the food. Also if you know how to add in random events that would be great too. But I only want them to get events if they are thieving or object training not when they are standing there or pking.

item.title: Food Timers?and Random Events?
item.dc:creator: @LeechYourStuffPlease LeechYourStuffPlease
item.description:
@LeechYourStuffPlease wrote:

Anyone describe to me how to put in food timers and a good time for the food.
Also
if you know how to add in random events that would be great too.
But
I only want them to get events if they are thieving or object training not when they are standing there or pking.
